mema sakakaruwan athadanguwata ganime di siwil aarakshaka balakaya sidukala meheya prasanshaniya bawa polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari prishantha jayakodi mahatha pawasayi.emenma athadanguwata gena sitina sakwithi ranasinha namaththa saha ohuge birindagen randawum niyoga matha thawaduratath prashna karana bawa polisiya prakasha karayi.aparadha parikshana departhamenthu wisin sakwithi ranasinha sathu banku ginum saha ganudenu pilibanda pulul parikshanayak aarambha kara athi bawa da sandahanya.

amerikawe nawa kramopayika wadagathkamin yuth sakachchawak sandaha amerikanaarakshaka lekam liyon paneta eeye indiyawata pamina atha .amerikawa saha indiyawa athara aarakshaka sabandatha mathaka sita thahawuru wi athath asiyawe pathaka yodhayek lesa nagi ena chinayebalaya yam aakarayakin madapawathwime ilakka sampurana karagatha yuthuwa athayi wishleshakayo prakashakara atha .meanuwa mema dedina sakachcha wataye di paneta aarakshaka sabandatha thawaduratath thahawurukara ganima, afgan yuddhaye netowekaryabharaya ,kalapaya thula chinaye aarthika saha yuda balaya wyapthawima wani wishayan kere wishesha awadhanayak yomukaranu atha .paneta indiya agamathi manmohan sin ,jathika aarakshaka upadeshaka shiw shankar menan hamuwimata niyamithaya .paneta wisin ada dinaprathipaththimaya deshanayak da pawathwanu atha .pasugiya janawariye di janadhipathi obama wisin nikuthkala nawa kramopayika salasme athishaya wadagath parshawakaruwek washayen naminsandahankara aththe indiyawa pamani .
ewani pramanayak asamath wimata, onlayin wibhaga pilibanda athi nodanuwathkama balapanna athi.
“yamekuta mebandu duwak wida, sundara pragnya aththiya kalakin mal pipunawu salwanayak waniwu thige piyata wandimin namas kara karami.”
(eekatath hethuwak thiyenawa, balanna)

rakiyawala niratha saudi jathikayangen thunen dekak rajya anshaye sewaye nirathawa sitithi. 2015 wasare warthawalata anuwa rajaye wiyadamwalin 45% wen kara aththe rajya anshaye watup saha dimana laba dima sandahaya.
